name: claude-code
description: Claude Code CLI integration via MCP - provides access to Claude Code's powerful development tools
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that wraps Claude Code CLI functionality, enabling other AI systems to interact with Claude Code through standardized MCP tools. This extension provides three core capabilities: `claude_ask` for full tool access conversations, `claude_plan` for read-only planning assistance, and `claude_resume` for continuing previous sessions. Perfect for integrating Claude Code's powerful development capabilities into other AI workflows and applications.

tools.name: claude_ask
tools.description: Ask Claude Code CLI a question or request with full tool access. Supports session management, custom working directories, and tool permissions.

tools.name: claude_plan
tools.description: Ask Claude Code CLI to create a plan using read-only mode with planning tools. Perfect for analyzing codebases and creating implementation strategies.

tools.name: claude_resume
tools.description: Resume a previous Claude Code CLI session by session ID. Maintains full conversation context and project state.

defaultWorkingDirectory.title: Default Working Directory
defaultWorkingDirectory.description: Default directory for Claude Code operations. If not specified, operations will use the current working directory.

defaultAllowedTools.title: Default Allowed Tools
defaultAllowedTools.description: Default set of tools Claude Code can use. Leave empty to allow all tools. Common tools include: Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Glob, Grep, Task, etc.
